name: scripts/Classes/Box.js
Box
description:
Creates and handles Box object data and
DOM interactions, including visual callbacks

name: setFilledStatus
description:
Determine whether the current box has an event associated with it
and sets the appropriate css class

name: flash
description:
`Box.flash()` is called by a `Row` object to animate 
a block as part of the `Tone.Sequencer` callback

name: scripts/Classes/DrumLoop.js
DrumLoop
description: Creates and controls the drum loop, overwrites the convertPattern() method

name: scripts/Classes/EffectsUI.js
EffectsUI
description: Create and handle effects user interaction objects

name: createHandle
description: Create handle for user interactions

name: updateEffects
description: Read handle location and update effect levels

name: scripts/Classes/Loop.js
Loop
description: Parent interface for MelodyLoop, BassLoop, and DrumLoop

name: constructor
description: Synthesizer loop structure and graphical representation

return.description: Scale members as strings with note names and octaves

name: convertPattern
description: Convert an array of note names into a series of patterns for use by `makeRows()`

name: scripts/Classes/PlayButton.js
PlayButton
description: Create master play button to start Tone.js and control play/pause events

name: constructor
description: Get element and create play button

name: listener
description: Activate Tone.js and control start/stop functionality

name: start
description: Start Tone.Transport

name: stop
description: Stop Tone.Transport

name: scripts/Classes/Row.js
Row
description: Creates and controls DOM objects for individual loop rows

params.name: label
params.description: Name of the row, to be added to the DOM object before any boxes

return.description: HTML span element with the row name

name: createBoxes
description: Build and store the series of boxes in the row

name: calculateBoxWidth
description:
Called by `createBoxes`, uses the number of boxes in
a row to calculate and set the CSS width property

name: createLoop
description:
Used by the constructor and click event callbacks to remove the
previous loop and replace it with an updated version

name: flashActiveBox
description:
Called in the Tone.Sequencer callback to determine which
box to animate

name: switchFilledStatus
description: Switch the status of a box as filled and not filled

name: updateSequencePattern
description:
Update the sequence object passed by Row whenever a user clicks
a box. This is part of the Box click event listener

name: scripts/audio.js
scripts/script.js

content:
# Loop Builder

![Documentation coverage](./dist/docs/badge.svg)

This is a test project that links [tone.js](https://tonejs.github.io) to a graphical interface to create looping melodies and rhythms. The current live version is at [cwitulski.com/loopBuilder](https://cwitulski.com/loopBuilder). Documentation is in [the docs folder](https://cwitulski.com/loopBuilder/docs).

## Features

* Change notes with simple UI
* Manipulate the timbre of generated synthesizer melodies using a graphical effects controller

### Next

* Consider removing note names

### After that

* Add tempo slider (move tempo logic to one place)
* Allow saving and loading
* Add buttons to change mode
* Write a short introduction

## Sounds

* Cowbell sound is from [GowlerMusic on freesound.org](https://freesound.org/people/GowlerMusic/sounds/364919/)
name: ./README.md
